quote: There had been times when he knew, somewhere in him, that he would get used to it, whatever it was, because he had learnt that some hard things became softer after a very little while.
quote_letters: THERE HAD BEEN TIMES WHEN HE KNEW SOMEWHERE IN HIM THAT HE WOULD GET USED TO IT WHATEVER IT WAS BECAUSE HE HAD LEARNT THAT SOME HARD THINGS BECAME SOFTER AFTER A VERY LITTLE WHILE
